EmailTemplate.subject: POD Point EV Chargepoint Installation Proposal - {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for your order of POD Point EV charging. Our first available slot for the installation is:
{!Case.Install_Scheduled_Start_Date_Time__c}
Your engineer will be {!Order.Installer_Name__c}, they will arrive as close as possible to the agreed time slot but please allow for up to an hour of fluctuation around the arrival time.
The site contact on our records is {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName} with number {!BLANKVALUE(Contact.Phone, Contact.MobilePhone)}, and will be sent equipment needed for the installation shortly before the installation date to the following address.
{!Account.Name} FAO: POD Point Ltd {!Order.ShippingStreet} {!Order.ShippingCity} {!Order.ShippingPostalCode}
To successfully carry out the installation we will need:
Access to the relevant plant room/distribution board, and all rooms and areas along the proposed cable route. Permission to turn off the distribution board to be used for the supply of the new charge-points for approximately 30 minutes. The relevant parking bays at the location of the new charge-points to be free of vehicles. All permissions for works to be in place. Barriers in place for area of works, if required. Adequate spare supply capacity available at the distribution board to be used for the charge-points. To be notified if RAMS are required prior to installation.
Please donâ€™t hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.
Kind Regards,
{!Case.Project_Manager__c} Project Manager POD Point
